title: S5 Ep29: Defusing the carbon bombs
itunes:title: Defusing the carbon bombs
description: Recorded live at CEPR Paris Symposium 2022:  Sanctions against Russia have sent the price of oil and gas rocketing – triggering more, not less, fossil fuel extraction, and some giant projects that have been called “carbon bombs”. Mar Réguant and Rick van der Ploeg tell Tim Phillips that these bombs will explode the climate commitments agreed in Paris in 2015.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
